black.text:
What happened
at Crystal's last
party?

What's the first sign
of simulation
sickness?

_______: The latest
in VR technology.

Hitler powered his
ovens using _______.

_______ is the
worst VR peripheral
I ever Kickstarted.

Coming soon
to AltspaceVR:
_______ live in VR!

How's this for a
band name: _______
and the _______s!

Imma let you finish,
but _______ had the
best _______ of all
time.

Make America
_______ Again!

Breaking news today
Obama has been accused
of _______ again!

What did Grumpy
threaten a small child
with?

I brought home
_______ for the kids.

When life gives you
_______, make _______.

We're all out of _______,
I'll use _______ instead.

Hey, would you like
to see my pet _______?
Who's your _______?

Wait, you have wood
floors? My floors are
made of _______!
What is the safeword?
How's your _______?

My brownies are
laced with _______.

I can't help it...
_______ just tastes
so good!

Scientists recently
discovered a new element,
which they have
appropriately named
_______.
_______ for president!

One time, I shoved
a whole _______ in my
ear!

Nooo! You can't leave
me here with these
_______!

My favorite boyscout
badge is the
_______ badge.

May I tell you
about our specials?
Tonight we have a nice
_______.

I value your _______,
not your _______.

I am _______,
leader of _______.

Sometimes I like to lay
in my _______ and
pretend I am a _______.

white.text:
The early signs
of simulation
sickness.

Putting your Vive
wand through
a $5000 TV.

Feeling just a little bit
moist.

Cramming a baby
in a toaster.

Pushing someone down
a flight of stairs.

Lighting a homeless
persons cardboard box
on fire.

Putting a can of
Dr Pepper© in your
anus and whispering
"The doctor is in."

A dagger made out
of a toothbrush.

A member of the
kool-kids klub.

A secret that isn't
a secret anymore.
